author: James Oppenheim
message: The foolish man seeks happiness in the distance, the wise grows it under his feet.
title: Thought of the day

author: Martha Washington
message: The greatest part of our happiness depends on our dispositions, not our circumstances.
title: Thought of the day

author: Margaret Bonnano
message: It is only possible to live happily ever after on a day to day basis.
title: Thought of the day

author: Goethe
message: A man sees in the world what he carries in his heart.
title: Thought of the day
